summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A BRITAX B-SAFE 35 REARFACING INFANT SEAT, MODEL NUMBER: E9BE53C. THE SEAT WAS MANUFACTURED ON JULY 12, 2013. THE SAFETY SEAT WAS BEING UTILIZED IN A 2004 KIA SORENTO. WHILE ATTEMPTING TO BUCKLE THE CHILD INTO THE SEAT, BOTH OF THE CROTCH BUCKLE LATCHES SEPARATED FROM THE HARNESS, CAUSING THE SEAT TO BECOME UNUSABLE. THE SEAT WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE PURCHASE DATE WAS UNKNOWN. ..UPDATED 07/12/17 *BF....UPDATED 07/13/17 *BF    *CN  *JS
